description: Lowering basement floor in rear room and rear building by 420mm, to improve wheelchair access; (2) increase height of party wall on boundary with nos. 32;  (3) install an internal perforated painted roller shutter to ground floor window facing St Johns Gardens (Full planning application ref: P080100 also submitted)
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The consent for the following details below is hereby granted for the benefit of occupation of the premises for the applicant's son Cato Heath and shall be reinstated to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority within 6 months of this occupation ceasing.

i)	new opening in the rear ground floor elevation 
ii)	removal of the existing window and apron
iii)	window seat 
iv)	installation of new door 
v)	construction of the porch and store to the roof garden at first floor level
vi)	three-storey glazed link incorporating the passenger lift 

REASON: To protect the special interest of the building included on the statutory list whilst recognising the special circumstances surrounding the proposal and the specific needs of the applicant's son, Cato Heath.
